name: Utpal Chandra De
content: Utpal Chandra De – School of Computer Applications Skip to content Go to KIIT Home pageKIIT HomeProf. Achyuta Samanta Founder – KIIT & KISS achyutasamanta.com Utpal Chandra De Utpal Chandra De Utpal Chandra De Assistant ProfessorMr. Utpal Chandra De is an M.Tech. in Comp. Sc. & Engg. Persuing his Ph. D. in Comp. Sc. & Engg. from KIIT University. He has more than 15 years of experience in teaching at UG and PG level. He joined KIIT University in June 2009. He has various publications to his credit in leading journals and conferences indexed in Scopus.
